data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Mainz.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
In the minute 5, In Mainz M´gladbach drive forward through Breel Embolo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
Frank Willenborg signals a Mainz throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
In the minute 9, Important block from the M´gladbach defence as Jean-Paul Boetius fires in a strike for Mainz.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! M´gladbach have got their heads in front thanks to a Lars Stindl strike.
In the minute 15, Breel Embolo with an assist there.
Free kick M´gladbach.
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of M´gladbach.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
M´gladbach advance rapidly upfield but Frank Willenborg blows for offside.
Jean-Paul Boetius gets his shot on target but fails to score for Mainz.
In the minute 20, Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Jean-Philippe Mateta is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
In the minute 26, Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Mainz.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
Mainz have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
M´gladbach are coming forward and Patrick Herrmann gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mainz drives forward and Robin Quaison gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 35, Frank Willenborg awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal! Jean-Philippe Mateta gives Mainz a 2-1 lead in Mainz.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
In the minute 39, Stefan Lainer's header is off-target for M´gladbach.
Goal kick for Mainz at Opel Arena.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Mainz in the half of M´gladbach.
At Opel Arena, Mainz are penalized for being offside.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 43, Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Patrick Herrmann for M´gladbach drives towards goal at Opel Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Free kick Mainz.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, Frank Willenborg has blown to start the second-half.
Mainz have a goal kick.
Can Mainz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
In the minute 49, Mainz's Pierre Kunde has been booked in Mainz.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, M´gladbach pushes forward through Patrick Herrmann, whose finish on goal is saved.
Robin Quaison of Mainz smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Breel Embolo (M´gladbach) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 54, M´gladbach make their second substitution with Alassane Plea replacing Tony Jantschke.
The away team replace Lars Stindl with Marcus Thuram.
Mainz's Jean-Paul Boetius gets in a shot but it is blocked by a M´gladbach defender.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Mainz.
Frank Willenborg awards the home team a throw-in.
Frank Willenborg awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Levin Oztunali for Mainz drives towards goal at Opel Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mainz.
In the minute 59, In Mainz M´gladbach drive forward through Alassane Plea. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Pierre Kunde (Mainz) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Frank Willenborg signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Mainz's half.
In the minute 60, The away team have replaced Rocco Reitz with Jonas Hofmann. This is the third substitution made today by Marco Rose.
Marco Rose (M´gladbach) is making a fourth substitution, with Florian Neuhaus replacing Christoph Kramer.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for M´gladbach close to the penalty box.
Can M´gladbach capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Luca Kilian for Mainz has been booked by Frank Willenborg and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
At Opel Arena, Florian Neuhaus has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 63, Mainz have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mainz.
Edimilson Fernandes is replacing Levin Oztunali for Mainz at Opel Arena.
In the minute 65, Jan Moritz Lichte is making the team's second substitution at Opel Arena with Leandro Martins replacing Pierre Kunde.
In Mainz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Mainz.
In the minute 68, Jonathan Michael Burkardt is replacing Robin Quaison for the home team.
Mainz's Daniel Brosinski misses with an attempt on goal.
Frank Willenborg awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Stefan Lainer (M´gladbach) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
In the minute 70, Marcus Thuram (M´gladbach) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Mainz at Opel Arena.
M´gladbach have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Hannes Wolf is on a sub for Breel Embolo for M´gladbach.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Mainz territory.
An attacking M´gladbach player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 75, Moussa Niakhate (Mainz) has received a yellow card from Frank Willenborg.
Jonas Hofmann scores from the spot to level the match at 2-2.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Mainz.
In the minute 77, Danny Latza is booked for the home team.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dong Won Ji is on a sub for Danny Latza for Mainz.
In the minute 81, Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach surge into the attack at Opel Arena but Matthias Ginter’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Goal! M´gladbach take a 2-3 lead through a well-placed header from Matthias Ginter.
That's a fine assist from Jonas Hofmann.
In the minute 83, Robin Zentner (Mainz) has received a yellow card from Frank Willenborg.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Marcus Thuram (M´gladbach) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Mainz.
M´gladbach's Alassane Plea is on target but unsuccessful.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Frank Willenborg.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Mainz at Opel Arena.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Mainz have a goal kick.
M´gladbach push upfield but Frank Willenborg quickly pulls them for offside.
Frank Willenborg signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Mainz push forward at Opel Arena and Robin Zentner gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined M´gladbach defence.
It's 2-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
